category-def.label: ProB for Rodin
category-def.description: ProB is an animator and model checker for the B-Method. It allows fully automatic animation of many B specifications, and can be used to systematically check a specification for errors. Part of the research and development was conducted within the EPSRC funded projects ABCD and iMoc, and within the EU funded projects Rodin and Deploy and the DFG projects Gepavas and Gepavas II. ProB has been successfully used on various industrial specifications and is now being used e.g. within Siemens, Alstom, Thales and ClearSy.
